alert.note: Alert for Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 11:30AM EDT until July 07 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Essex County in northern New York... Northwestern Addison County in central Vermont... Western Chittenden County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 1215 PM EDT. * At 1129 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elizabethtown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Vergennes, Essex, Willsboro, Westport, Elizabethtown, Kingsland Bay State Park, Ferrisburgh, Panton, Lewis, Fort Cassin Point, North West Bay, Willsboro Point, Porter Bay, Louis Clearing Bay, Fields Bay, Deerhead, New Russia, South Bay In Essex County, Split Rock Point, and Cold Spring Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Champlain should seek safe harbor now! Strong winds will cause higher waves and sudden wind shifts may overturn boats. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
